field.label: Name
field.help: Name to identify this error file.

field.label: Error code
field.help:
The HTTP status code.
NOTE: It is important to understand that errorfiles are NOT meant to rewrite errors returned by the server, but errors detected and returned by HAProxy. This is why the list of supported errors is limited to a small set.

field.label: Content
field.help: Paste the content of your errorfile here. The files should not exceed the configured buffer size, which generally is 8 or 16 kB.
